mapper.insert: insert into s_dict ( id, dictcode, dictname, dictvalue, sorts, note, parentId ) values (uuid (), #{dictcode},#{dictname},#{dictvalue},#{sorts},#{note},#{parentId})
mapper.select: select d.`id`, d.`dictcode`, d.`dictname`, d.`dictvalue`, d.`sorts`, d.`note` from s_dict d where d.`isdel`=0 and d.parentId=#{pid} order by d.sorts
